reference.shortdesc: The closereqs element contains information about closing requirements â€“ steps or tasks that the user should perform after completing a task, for example, "Check around the vehicle for any drips or leaks."

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <closereqs> <reqconds> <reqcond>Run the engine and then check the dipstick to ensure the vehicle has enough oil. </reqcond> <reqcond>Check around the vehicle for any drips or leaks. </reqcond> </reqconds> </closereqs>
